title: Getting Started with omophub
text: omophub package provides R interface OMOPHub API accessing OHDSI ATHENA standardized medical vocabularies. vignette demonstrates basic usage patterns.

title: Getting Started with omophub
text: package requires API key OMOPHub. Set API key environment variable: add .Renviron file persistence:

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: library(omophub)  # Create client (reads API key from environment) client <- OMOPHubClient$new()  # Or provide API key explicitly client <- OMOPHubClient$new(api_key = "your_api_key")  # With additional options client <- OMOPHubClient$new(   api_key = "your_api_key",   timeout = 30,   max_retries = 3,   vocab_version = "2025.1" )

title: Getting Started with omophub
text: Retrieve concept OMOP concept ID: Get concept vocabulary-specific code:
code: concept <- client$concepts$get(201826) print(concept$concept_name) # [1] "Type 2 diabetes mellitus" concept <- client$concepts$get_by_code("SNOMED", "44054006") print(concept$concept_name) # [1] "Type 2 diabetes mellitus"

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: result <- client$concepts$batch(c(201826, 4329847, 1112807)) for (concept in result$concepts) {   cat(sprintf("%s: %s\n", concept$concept_id, concept$concept_name)) }

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: results <- client$search$basic("diabetes mellitus", page_size = 10) for (concept in results$data) {   cat(sprintf("%s: %s\n", concept$concept_id, concept$concept_name)) } results <- client$search$basic(   "heart attack",   vocabulary_ids = "SNOMED",   domain_ids = "Condition",   page_size = 20 )

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: suggestions <- client$search$autocomplete("diab", max_suggestions = 5) for (s in suggestions$suggestions) {   print(s$suggestion) }

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: # First page results <- client$search$basic("diabetes", page = 1, page_size = 50)  # Check pagination info print(results$meta$total_items) print(results$meta$has_next)  # Get next page if available if (isTRUE(results$meta$has_next)) {   page2 <- client$search$basic("diabetes", page = 2, page_size = 50) }

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: all_results <- client$search$basic_all(   "diabetes",   page_size = 100,   max_pages = 5,   progress = TRUE )  # Results are a tibble print(nrow(all_results)) print(names(all_results))

title: Getting Started with omophub
text: Get ancestors (parent concepts): Get descendants (child concepts):
code: result <- client$hierarchy$ancestors(201826, max_levels = 3) for (ancestor in result$ancestors) {   print(ancestor$concept_name) } result <- client$hierarchy$descendants(201826, max_levels = 2) for (descendant in result$descendants) {   print(descendant$concept_name) }

title: Getting Started with omophub
text: Find concept maps vocabularies: Map specific vocabularies:
code: result <- client$mappings$get(201826) for (mapping in result$mappings) {   cat(sprintf("%s: %s\n",               mapping$target_vocabulary_id,               mapping$target_concept_name)) } result <- client$mappings$get(   201826,   target_vocabularies = c("ICD10CM", "ICD9CM") )

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: tryCatch(   {     concept <- client$concepts$get(999999999)   },   omophub_not_found = function(e) {     message("Concept not found: ", e$message)   },   omophub_api_error = function(e) {     message("API error: ", e$message)   } )

title: Getting Started with omophub
text: OMOPHub API Documentation Package Documentation GitHub Repository

title: Authors and Citation
text: OMOPHub Team. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Team O (2025). omophub: R Client OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API. R package version 1.0.0, https://github.com/omopHub/omophub-R.
code: @Manual{,   title = {omophub: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API},   author = {OMOPHub Team},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 1.0.0},   url = {https://github.com/omopHub/omophub-R}, }

what: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: R client OMOPHub API, providing access OHDSI ATHENA standardized medical vocabularies.

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: can install development version omophub GitHub:

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: Set API key using one methods:
code: # Option 1: Environment variable (recommended) Sys.setenv(OMOPHUB_API_KEY = "your_api_key")  # Option 2: Use the helper function library(omophub) set_api_key("your_api_key")  # Option 3: Store securely in system keyring set_api_key("your_api_key", store = "keyring")

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
code: library(omophub)  # Create a client client <- OMOPHubClient$new()  # Search for concepts results <- client$search$basic("diabetes") results$data  # Get a specific concept concept <- client$concepts$get(201826) concept$concept_name # [1] "Type 2 diabetes mellitus"  # Get concept by vocabulary code concept <- client$concepts$get_by_code("SNOMED", "44054006")  # Batch lookup multiple concepts batch <- client$concepts$batch(c(201826, 320128, 4329847))  # Get concept ancestors (hierarchy) ancestors <- client$hierarchy$ancestors(201826)  # Get concept mappings to another vocabulary mappings <- client$mappings$get(201826, target_vocabularies = "ICD10CM")

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: large result sets, use automatic pagination:
code: # Fetch all results automatically all_results <- client$search$basic_all("diabetes", page_size = 100)  # Or paginate manually page1 <- client$search$basic("diabetes", page = 1, page_size = 20) page2 <- client$search$basic("diabetes", page = 2, page_size = 20)

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
code: tryCatch(   {     result <- client$concepts$get(999999999)   },   omophub_api_error = function(e) {     message("API error: ", conditionMessage(e))   },   omophub_auth_error = function(e) {     message("Authentication failed")   } )

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: R6 class providing access concept operations.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: list containing concept data. list containing concept data mappings. list concepts failures. list suggestions. Related concepts scores analysis. Relationships summary.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: ConceptsResource$new() ConceptsResource$get() ConceptsResource$get_by_code() ConceptsResource$batch() ConceptsResource$suggest() ConceptsResource$related() ConceptsResource$relationships() ConceptsResource$print() ConceptsResource$clone()

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$get(   concept_id,   include_relationships = FALSE,   include_synonyms = FALSE )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: concept_id OMOP concept ID. include_relationships Include related concepts. Default FALSE. include_synonyms Include concept synonyms. Default FALSE.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: vocabulary_id vocabulary ID (e.g., "SNOMED", "ICD10CM"). concept_code concept code within vocabulary.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$batch(   concept_ids,   include_relationships = FALSE,   include_synonyms = FALSE,   include_mappings = FALSE,   vocabulary_filter = NULL,   standard_only = FALSE )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: concept_ids Vector concept IDs (max 1000). include_relationships Include related concepts. Default FALSE. include_synonyms Include concept synonyms. Default FALSE. include_mappings Include concept mappings. Default FALSE. vocabulary_filter Filter results specific vocabularies. standard_only return standard concepts. Default FALSE.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$suggest(query, vocabulary = NULL, domain = NULL, limit = 10)

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: query Search query (min 2 characters). vocabulary Filter specific vocabulary. domain Filter specific domain. limit Maximum suggestions (default 10, max 50).

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$related(   concept_id,   relatedness_types = NULL,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   domain_ids = NULL,   min_relatedness_score = NULL,   max_results = 50,   include_scores = TRUE,   standard_concepts_only = FALSE )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: concept_id source concept ID. relatedness_types Types relatedness (hierarchical, semantic, etc.). vocabulary_ids Filter specific vocabularies. domain_ids Filter specific domains. min_relatedness_score Minimum relatedness score. max_results Maximum results (default 50, max 200). include_scores Include score breakdown. Default TRUE. standard_concepts_only return standard concepts. Default FALSE.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$relationships(   concept_id,   relationship_type = NULL,   target_vocabulary = NULL,   include_invalid = FALSE,   page = 1,   page_size = 20 )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: concept_id concept ID. relationship_type Filter relationship type. target_vocabulary Filter target vocabulary. include_invalid Include invalid relationships. Default FALSE. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Items per page. Default 20.

title: Domains Resource — DomainsResource
text: R6 class providing access domain operations.

title: Domains Resource — DomainsResource
code: DomainsResource$list(   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   include_concept_counts = TRUE,   include_statistics = FALSE,   include_examples = FALSE,   standard_only = FALSE,   active_only = TRUE,   sort_by = "domain_id",   sort_order = "asc" )

title: Domains Resource — DomainsResource
text: vocabulary_ids Filter vocabularies. include_concept_counts Include concept counts. Default TRUE. include_statistics Include detailed statistics. Default FALSE. include_examples Include example concepts. Default FALSE. standard_only standard concepts. Default FALSE. active_only active domains. Default TRUE. sort_by Sort field. Default "domain_id". sort_order Sort order. Default "asc".

title: Domains Resource — DomainsResource
code: DomainsResource$concepts(   domain_id,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   concept_class_ids = NULL,   standard_only = FALSE,   page = 1,   page_size = 50 )

title: Domains Resource — DomainsResource
text: domain_id domain ID. vocabulary_ids Filter vocabularies. concept_class_ids Filter concept classes. standard_only standard concepts. Default FALSE. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 50.

title: Hierarchy Resource — HierarchyResource
text: R6 class providing access hierarchy operations (ancestors descendants).

title: Hierarchy Resource — HierarchyResource
text: Ancestors hierarchy summary. Descendants hierarchy summary.

title: Hierarchy Resource — HierarchyResource
code: HierarchyResource$ancestors(   concept_id,   vocabulary_id = NULL,   max_levels = NULL,   relationship_types = NULL,   include_paths = FALSE,   include_distance = TRUE,   standard_only = FALSE,   include_deprecated = FALSE,   page = 1,   page_size = 100 )

title: Hierarchy Resource — HierarchyResource
text: concept_id concept ID. vocabulary_id Filter specific vocabulary. max_levels Maximum hierarchy levels traverse. relationship_types Relationship types follow (default: ""). include_paths Include path information. Default FALSE. include_distance Include distance source. Default TRUE. standard_only return standard concepts. Default FALSE. include_deprecated Include deprecated concepts. Default FALSE. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 100.

title: Hierarchy Resource — HierarchyResource
code: HierarchyResource$descendants(   concept_id,   vocabulary_id = NULL,   max_levels = 10,   relationship_types = NULL,   include_distance = TRUE,   standard_only = FALSE,   include_deprecated = FALSE,   domain_ids = NULL,   concept_class_ids = NULL,   include_synonyms = FALSE,   page = 1,   page_size = 100 )

title: Hierarchy Resource — HierarchyResource
text: concept_id concept ID. vocabulary_id Filter specific vocabulary. max_levels Maximum hierarchy levels (default 10, max 10). relationship_types Relationship types follow. include_distance Include distance source. Default TRUE. standard_only return standard concepts. Default FALSE. include_deprecated Include deprecated concepts. Default FALSE. domain_ids Filter domains. concept_class_ids Filter concept classes. include_synonyms Include synonyms. Default FALSE. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 100.

title: Mappings Resource — MappingsResource
text: R6 class providing access mapping operations.

title: Mappings Resource — MappingsResource
code: MappingsResource$get(   concept_id,   target_vocabularies = NULL,   mapping_types = NULL,   direction = "both",   include_indirect = FALSE,   standard_only = FALSE,   include_mapping_quality = FALSE,   include_synonyms = FALSE,   include_context = FALSE,   active_only = TRUE,   sort_by = NULL,   sort_order = NULL,   page = 1,   page_size = 50 )

title: Mappings Resource — MappingsResource
text: concept_id concept ID. target_vocabularies Filter target vocabularies. mapping_types Filter mapping types. direction Mapping direction ("outgoing", "incoming", ""). Default "". include_indirect Include indirect mappings. Default FALSE. standard_only standard concept mappings. Default FALSE. include_mapping_quality Include quality metrics. Default FALSE. include_synonyms Include synonyms. Default FALSE. include_context Include mapping context. Default FALSE. active_only active mappings. Default TRUE. sort_by Sort field. sort_order Sort order. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 50.

title: Mappings Resource — MappingsResource
code: MappingsResource$map(   source_concepts,   target_vocabulary,   mapping_type = NULL,   include_invalid = FALSE )

title: Mappings Resource — MappingsResource
text: source_concepts Vector OMOP concept IDs map. target_vocabulary Target vocabulary ID (e.g., "ICD10CM", "SNOMED"). mapping_type Mapping type (direct, equivalent, broader, narrower). include_invalid Include invalid mappings. Default FALSE.

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
text: R6 class interacting OMOPHub vocabulary service. Provides access OHDSI ATHENA standardized medical vocabularies.

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
text: client provides access resources: concepts: Concept lookup batch operations search: Basic advanced concept search vocabularies: Vocabulary listing details domains: Domain listing concept filtering hierarchy: Ancestor descendant navigation relationships: Concept relationships mappings: Concept mappings vocabularies

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
text: concepts Access concept operations. search Access search operations. vocabularies Access vocabulary operations. domains Access domain operations. hierarchy Access hierarchy operations. relationships Access relationship operations. mappings Access mapping operations.

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
code: OMOPHubClient$new(   api_key = NULL,   base_url = NULL,   timeout = 30,   max_retries = 3,   vocab_version = NULL )

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
text: api_key API key authentication. provided, reads OMOPHUB_API_KEY environment variable system keyring. base_url API base URL. Defaults https://api.omophub.com/v1. timeout Request timeout seconds. Defaults 30. max_retries Maximum retry attempts failed requests. Defaults 3. vocab_version Optional vocabulary version (e.g., "2025.1"). specified, uses latest version.

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Create client (uses OMOPHUB_API_KEY env var) client <- OMOPHubClient$new()  # Or with explicit API key client <- OMOPHubClient$new(api_key = "your_api_key")  # Search for concepts results <- client$search$basic("diabetes")  # Get a specific concept concept <- client$concepts$get(201826)  # Use specific vocabulary version client <- OMOPHubClient$new(vocab_version = "2025.1") } # }

title: Relationships Resource — RelationshipsResource
text: R6 class providing access relationship operations.

title: Relationships Resource — RelationshipsResource
code: RelationshipsResource$get(   concept_id,   relationship_type = NULL,   target_vocabulary = NULL,   include_invalid = FALSE,   page = 1,   page_size = 50 )

title: Relationships Resource — RelationshipsResource
text: concept_id concept ID. relationship_type Filter relationship type. target_vocabulary Filter target vocabulary. include_invalid Include invalid relationships. Default FALSE. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 50.

title: Relationships Resource — RelationshipsResource
code: RelationshipsResource$types(   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   include_reverse = FALSE,   include_usage_stats = FALSE,   include_examples = FALSE,   category = NULL,   is_defining = NULL,   standard_only = FALSE,   page = 1,   page_size = 100 )

title: Relationships Resource — RelationshipsResource
text: vocabulary_ids Filter vocabularies. include_reverse Include reverse relationships. Default FALSE. include_usage_stats Include usage statistics. Default FALSE. include_examples Include example concepts. Default FALSE. category Filter category. is_defining Filter defining status. standard_only standard relationships. Default FALSE. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 100.

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: R6 class providing access search operations.

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: Search results pagination. tibble matching concepts. Search results facets metadata. Autocomplete suggestions.

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: SearchResource$new() SearchResource$basic() SearchResource$basic_all() SearchResource$advanced() SearchResource$autocomplete() SearchResource$print() SearchResource$clone()

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
code: SearchResource$basic(   query,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   domain_ids = NULL,   concept_class_ids = NULL,   standard_concept = NULL,   include_synonyms = FALSE,   include_invalid = FALSE,   min_score = NULL,   exact_match = FALSE,   page = 1,   page_size = 20,   sort_by = NULL,   sort_order = NULL )

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: query Search query string. vocabulary_ids Filter vocabulary IDs. domain_ids Filter domain IDs. concept_class_ids Filter concept class IDs. standard_concept Filter standard concept ("S", "C", NULL). include_synonyms Search synonyms. Default FALSE. include_invalid Include invalid concepts. Default FALSE. min_score Minimum relevance score. exact_match Require exact match. Default FALSE. page Page number (1-based). Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 20. sort_by Sort field. sort_order Sort order ("asc" "desc").

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
code: SearchResource$basic_all(   query,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   domain_ids = NULL,   page_size = 100,   max_pages = Inf,   progress = TRUE,   ... )

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: query Search query string. vocabulary_ids Filter vocabulary IDs. domain_ids Filter domain IDs. page_size Results per page. Default 100. max_pages Maximum pages fetch. Default Inf. progress Show progress bar. Default TRUE. ... Additional search parameters.

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
code: SearchResource$advanced(   query,   vocabularies = NULL,   domains = NULL,   concept_classes = NULL,   standard_concepts_only = FALSE,   include_invalid = FALSE,   relationship_filters = NULL,   limit = 20,   offset = 0 )

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: query Search query string. vocabularies Filter vocabularies. domains Filter domains. concept_classes Filter concept classes. standard_concepts_only return standard concepts. Default FALSE. include_invalid Include invalid concepts. Default FALSE. relationship_filters Relationship-based filters. limit Maximum results. Default 20. offset Result offset. Default 0.

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
code: SearchResource$autocomplete(   query,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   domains = NULL,   max_suggestions = 10 )

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: query Partial query string. vocabulary_ids Filter vocabulary IDs. domains Filter domains. max_suggestions Maximum suggestions. Default 10.

title: Vocabularies Resource — VocabulariesResource

text: Paginated vocabulary list. Vocabulary details. Vocabulary statistics. Domain statistics vocabularies. Paginated concepts.

Default "name". sort_order Sort order ("asc" "desc"). Default "asc". page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 100.

text: vocabulary_id vocabulary ID. domain_id Filter domain. concept_class_id Filter concept class. standard_only standard concepts. Default FALSE. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 50.

what: omophub: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API — omophub-package
title: omophub: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API — omophub-package
text: Provides R interface OMOPHub API accessing OHDSI ATHENA standardized medical vocabularies. Supports concept search, vocabulary exploration, hierarchy navigation, relationship queries, concept mappings automatic pagination rate limiting. Provides R interface OMOPHub API accessing OHDSI ATHENA standardized medical vocabularies. Supports concept search, vocabulary exploration, hierarchy navigation, relationship queries, concept mappings automatic pagination rate limiting.

code: library(omophub) client <- OMOPHubClient$new()  # Search for concepts results <- client$search$basic("diabetes")  # Get a specific concept concept <- client$concepts$get(201826)

title: omophub: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API — omophub-package
text: client provides access resources: concepts: Concept lookup batch operations search: Basic advanced concept search vocabularies: Vocabulary listing details domains: Domain listing concept filtering hierarchy: Ancestor descendant navigation relationships: Concept relationships mappings: Concept mappings vocabularies

Fetch All Paginated Results — paginate_all
text: Fetches pages results combines single tibble.

title: Fetch All Paginated Results — paginate_all
code: paginate_all(fetch_fn, page_size = 100, max_pages = Inf, progress = TRUE)

title: Fetch All Paginated Results — paginate_all
text: fetch_fn function takes page size arguments returns list data (results) meta (pagination metadata). page_size Number items per page. Default 100. max_pages Maximum number pages fetch. Default Inf. progress Show progress bar. Default TRUE.

title: Create Lazy Pagination Iterator — paginate_lazy
text: fetch_fn function takes page size arguments. page_size Number items per page. Default 100.

title: Perform GET Request — perform_get
text: base_req Base request object. endpoint API endpoint path. query Named list query parameters.

title: Perform GET Request — perform_get
text: Parsed JSON response. paginated endpoints, returns list data (results) meta (pagination info). single-item endpoints, returns unwrapped data directly.

title: Perform POST Request — perform_post
code: perform_post(base_req, endpoint, body = NULL, query = NULL)

title: Perform POST Request — perform_post
text: base_req Base request object. endpoint API endpoint path. body Named list JSON body. query Named list query parameters.

title: Perform POST Request — perform_post
text: Parsed JSON response (unwrapped data field present).

title: Set OMOPHub API Key — set_api_key
text: Stores OMOPHub API key specified location.

title: Set OMOPHub API Key — set_api_key
text: key API key store. store store key. One : "env": Set environment variable current session (default) "keyring": Store securely system keyring (requires keyring package)

title: Set OMOPHub API Key — set_api_key
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Store in environment (current session only) set_api_key("your_api_key")  # Store securely in keyring (persistent) set_api_key("your_api_key", store = "keyring") } # }

title: Validate Concept ID — validate_concept_id
text: concept_id concept ID validate. arg Argument name error messages. call calling environment.

title: Validate Page Parameters — validate_pagination
code: validate_pagination(   page,   page_size,   max_page_size = 1000,   call = rlang::caller_env() )

title: Validate Page Parameters — validate_pagination
text: page Page number. page_size Page size. max_page_size Maximum allowed page size. call calling environment.

title: omophub 1.0.0
text: Client: R6-based OMOPHubClient accessing OMOPHub API Concepts: Get, batch lookup, suggest, explore medical concepts Search: Basic advanced search filtering pagination Vocabularies: List explore OMOP vocabularies Domains: Browse concepts clinical domain Hierarchy: Navigate concept ancestors descendants Relationships: Query concept relationships Mappings: Map concepts vocabularies

title: omophub 1.0.0
text: Automatic rate limiting httr2::req_throttle() Automatic retry exponential backoff transient errors Pagination helpers (basic_all()) returning tibbles Environment variable support API key (OMOPHUB_API_KEY) Vocabulary version pinning via vocab_version parameter

title: omophub 1.0.0
text: Full roxygen2 documentation exported functions Getting started vignette pkgdown website support
